relevant_findings.heent: Attractive/Normal, Extraocular Movements Intact, Pupils Equal, Round, Reactive to Light, anicteric sclera, pink conjunctiva, moist mucous membranes, good dentition
relevant_findings.neck: Nontender, supple neck, no lymphadenopathy, no jugular venous distension, mildly enlarged thyroid without nodules
relevant_findings.cardiac: Regular rate and rhythm, no murmurs, gallops, or rubs
relevant_findings.lung: Clear to auscultation bilaterally, no wheezes, rales, rhonchi, breathing comfortably without use of accessory muscles
relevant_findings.abdomen: Nondistended, positive bowel sounds, tender in left lower quadrant and right lower quadrant, no rebound or guarding, no hepatosplenomegaly
relevant_findings.extremities: No cyanosis, clubbing, or edema, moving all four extremities with purpose
relevant_findings.skin: Warm and well perfused, no excoriations or lesions, no rashes

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Complain of LLQ and RLQ pain, no other gastrointestinal or urinary disturbances.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Reported feeling better despite ongoing pain in the left and right lower quadrants.
